title: HESE Calibration Telemetry Contract
description: Defines the required payload structure for Trust and Risk Calibration Factors (TCF/RCF) broadcast by HESE to upstream arbiters.

evolution_id.description: Unique identifier for the evolution batch contributing to the calculation.

RCF.description: Risk Calibration Factor (Multiplier affecting MCRA's Operational Risk Buffer).

delta_average.description: The normalized historical average of the prediction error ($ ar{\Delta}_T$).

delta_variance.description: The statistical variance of prediction errors in the recent window, critical for RCF calculation.
